title: Full-Time Video Editor & Content Creator - Financial Advisory Channel
job_overview:
ABOUT NEXT PHASE ADVISORS
We're a rapidly growing retirement planning firm helping families create guaranteed income through our Safe Bucket Blueprint™ methodology. Our founder, Jeremiah Nolen, CRPC®, is author of "Retire with a Paycheck" and has helped 500+ families achieve successful retirements.

We're building a dominant YouTube presence to become the #1 authority on retirement planning, and we need a strategic video editing partner to help us scale.

THE OPPORTUNITY
This is NOT typical project-based editing work. You'll become a key teaUpgrade to see actual infomber in our content multiplication system, where ONE flagship video becomes 50+ pieces of content across all platforms.

PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Edit 8-12 minute educational YouTube videos monthly (Adobe Premiere Pro/Final Cut)
- Create 5 YouTube Shorts (30-60 seconds) from each flagship video
- Integrate professional slide presentations with talking head footage
- Add graphics, animations, and visual elements for educational content
- Create multiple thumbnail options for A/B testing
- Maintain brand consistency across all video content
- Collaborate with VA and content team on integrated campaigns

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR:
- 3+ years professional video editing experience
- YouTube content experience with platform optimization knowledge
- Educational/professional content background (not entertainment)
- Excellent English communication skills
- Reliable high-speed internet and professional editing equipment
- Portfolio showing clean, professional editing style

WHAT MAKES THIS SPECIAL:
- Work directly with successful entrepreneur and published author
- Learn advanced content marketing that generates real business results
- Stable, long-term position with growth opportunities
- Creative freedom within professional brand guidelines
- Performance bonuses for videos meeting view targets

COMPENSATION & BENEFITS:
- Starting: $800-1,000 USD/month (based on experience)
- Performance bonuses: $Upgrade to see actual infomonthly for successful videos
- Equipment allowance: $300 for setup/upgrades
- Internet allowance: $50 monthly
- Professional development: $200 annually
- Health bonus: $100 monthly
- 13th month bonus
- Channel milestone bonuses (10K, 50K, 100K subscribers)

APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS:
1. Portfolio/reel (3-5 minutes) showcasing professional work
2. Detailed resume highlighting video editing experience
3. Cover letter explaining interest in financial content
4. Equipment list and availability

Qualified candidates will complete a PAID test project ($100) editing 10 minutes of raw footage.

We're looking for someone who wants to grow with us long-term and is excited about creating content that helps families achieve financial security.

Ready to join our mission? Apply with all required materials!
